entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
